Token.Abstract: Replaces occurances of string in a text file. Does nothing if file does not exist. File is written atomically.

Parameter.Name: replace
Parameter.Abstract: The string to replace occurances of 'search' with.

Parameter.Name: file
Parameter.Abstract: The file (with optional path) in which to replace strings.

Parameter.Name: encoding
Parameter.Abstract: The NSStringEncoding used by the file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns the file contents with search string occurances replaced, or nil if there was an error in input or reading the file.

Token.Abstract: Removes all characters not in the ASCII character set (decimal range 32-126).

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string with all non-ASCII characters removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes illegal filesystem characters from the string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string with all illegal file system characters removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes whitespace and newline characters from the beginning and end of the string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string with whitespace and newline characters trimmed.

Token.Abstract: Removes characters from the string that are illegal to use in .xcodeproj bundle and related files.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string with all illegal .xcodeproj characters removed.

Token.Abstract: A CGRect converted from a string rect representation like "{{10, 20}, {300, 400}}".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A CGRect converted from a string rect representation like "{{10, 20}, {300, 400}}".

Token.Abstract: A CGSize converted from a string size representation like "{10, 20}".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A CGSize converted from a string size representation like "{10, 20}".

Token.Abstract: A CGPoint converted from a string point representation like "{300, 400}".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A CGPoint converted from a string point representation like "{300, 400}".

Token.Abstract: String converted to SKColor object. The string must be in the form "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" where the values stand for the RGBA color values in the same order.

ReturnValue.Abstract: String converted to SKColor object. The string must be in the form "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" where the values stand for the RGBA color values in the same order.

Token.Abstract: Performs a case sensitive search for a substring. Returns YES if the string contains the substring.

Parameter.Name: subString
Parameter.Abstract: The sub string to search for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the subString is contained in the string.
